title: Hanukkah Beer: He'Brew, The chosen beer
body: <p>Mom-dogg sent me this <a href="http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=4223368" title="NPR's Scott Simon talks with Jeremy Cowan, the founder of Schmaltz Brewing Company and the originator of HE'BREW beer">4 minute NPR piece</a> about <a href="http://www.shmaltz.com/" title="Schmaltz Brewing Company and the originator of HE'BREW beer">Schmaltz Brewing Company</a>, the makers of: HE'BREW, the chosen beer.  A kosher beer made especially for Hanukkah.  Available in Genesis Ale (their first creation - a blend between pale and amber ales), Messiah Bold (on Schmaltz's 8th anniversary it's 8 malts, 8 hops, and 8% alcohol) and Miraculous Jewbilation (new this year, the most extreme Hanukkah beer ever created). <a href="http://www.shmaltz.com/twojews/images/TwoJews.mov" title="Two Jews walk into a bar...">Don't pass out, Passover</a>!</p><p><a href="http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=4223368" title="NPR's Scott Simon talks with Jeremy Cowan, the founder of Schmaltz Brewing Company and the originator of HE'BREW beer"><img src="http://www.npr.org/programs/wesat/features/2004/dec/beer/beer200.jpg" alt="He'Bew, the chosen beer" /></a></p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-12-14

Hanukkah Beer: He'Brew, The chosen beer

Mom-dogg sent me this
NPR's Scott Simon talks with Jeremy Cowan, the founder of Schmaltz Brewing Company and the originator of HE'BREW beer
